backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining centres, embed config, mock tests, announcements, and user profiles with authorization checks and CRUD APIs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to frontend files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing all major frontend files and their roles in routing, UI layout, pages, and assets.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and extensive OKLCH theme variables with light/dark mode colors applied globally.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, favicons, fonts, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all TanStack Router routes, layout, and hidden pages, returning the main RouterProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer component with institute info, navigation links, contact details, social icons, and secret forest navigation.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with logo, navigation links, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper providing header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/media/FacebookVi: Embeds a Facebook video using the share URL and shows a fallback message if parsing fails.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Ch: Displays a grid of Demon Slayer character cards with styled effects.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Fi: Runs a timed Fire Wheel and blackout sequence before navigating to a fake 404 page.
Shows a Fire Wheel video or fallback animation, auto-completing after a configured duration.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Fo: Renders an animated forest background with drifting effects and falling leaves.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/In: Timed sequence showing falling, Muzan appearance, and glitch phases before completion.
frontend/src/components/secret-forest/Ma: Grid of links to Demon Slayer volumes on Viz, each displayed as a styled card.
frontend/src/config/fireWheel.ts: Configuration for Fire Wheel clip URL and timing values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useEasterEggClickCoun: Tracks clicks for an easter egg and triggers a callback when a threshold is reached.
frontend/src/hooks/useIdleDetector.ts: Custom React hook that tracks user activity and triggers an idle callback after a configurable timeout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and helpers for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoopingAudio.ts: Hook for creating and controlling a looping audio element with play, mute, and autoplay handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color variables and themed component/animation styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page requiring login and an access code, with admin status validation via actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays announcements with optional media using actor-backed queries and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CentresPage.tsx: Fetches and displays centre data from the actor with loading states, empty state easter egg navigation, and a list of centres with contact info.
frontend/src/pages/CoursesPage.tsx: Renders a simple courses page with a header and a message indicating no course data is available.
frontend/src/pages/Fake404KickoutPage.ts: Shows a stylized 404 kickout screen with dramatic visuals and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main homepage with hero section, video embeds, and feature highlights for the institute.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login, logout, and user profile setup with related queries and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/MockTestsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays mock tests filtered by type, rendering video, PDF, or text content with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a simple 404 page with a message and a button to navigate back home.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Displays static student and parent reviews with names, ratings, and locations.
frontend/src/pages/SecretForestPage.tsx: Implements the Secret Forest page with audio playback, idleâ€‘triggered animation sequences, and click-based character reveal logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage persistence and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features for the Saha Institute site.
